hero.title: Computer Engineer | Full-Stack Developer
hero.shortDescription: Computer Engineering graduate with a strong foundation in algorithms and software development. Currently focused on backend development with Java and Spring Boot, while also building experience in frontend and mobile technologies. A fast learner and collaborative problem-solver, eager to contribute to real-world projects and grow through continuous learning.

blogs.title: The Blog is
blogs.description: I'm currently curating deep-dive articles on software architecture, system design patterns, and engineering insights. Stay tuned for the release.
blogs.spamNote: No spam. Unsubscribe at any time.

contact.title: Get in
contact.description: I am a recent Computer Engineering graduate looking for new opportunities. Whether you have a job opening or just want to say hi, I'd love to hear from you!
